subject: Bears
Hunting and Trapping
lead_paragraph: A 17-year-old Michigan girl began her big-game hunting career in a big way, killing a 448-pound black bear with a bow and arrow from 16 yards.
snippet: A 17-year-old Michigan girl began her big-game hunting career in a big way, killing a 448-pound black bear with a bow and arrow from 16 yards.
